location: Garden area near banana trees, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: morning_dog_bedding_sun_drying
summary: Morning sun-drying of dog bedding after sunlight became available.
description: This data unit documents the routine activity of hanging dog bedding for sun-drying in the morning. The activity was performed after sunlight became available, following earlier low-light morning conditions. The image records the presence of sunlight shortly after 08:00.

activity_context.sunlight_condition: sunlight present after early-morning low light

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
